name: Shark Life (Woo Studios)
description:
Ever wonder what it's like to:

  • Stuff 250 sharks into a box
  • Make kinetic shark art
  • Cram 100 sharks in a tube

If you said yes, then say hello to SHARK LIFE!!!

Hours of fun and entertainment will come from the shark blender alone, but with 7 cool courses you can throw sharks into, the fun will never end!

Made using Unreal Engine 4 by Epic Games
